summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of PatangeNotes blogging platform. All backend APIs (17/17) and frontend features (11/11) tested successfully. Platform is fully functional with proper authentication, CRUD operations, search/filter capabilities, and professional UI.

design_issues.issue: Future compatibility warnings in console for v7 transition flags

passed_tests: Admin authentication rejection with invalid credentials
About page displays founder info and social links
Blog post creation via admin panel
Created posts appear on public blog list
Individual blog post pages load correctly
Search and filter functionality on blog list
